text: Josep Ramon Mòdol i Pifarré (21 September 1957 - 10 July 2020) was a Spanish sociologist, politician and writer. He was born in Lleida, Catalonia. Mòdol i Pifarré was a Deputy between 1989 to 1993. He was a Senator between from 1996 to 2000. Mòdol i Pifarré died on 10 July 2020 from cancer in Barcelona, aged 62.Mor l'escriptor i professor lleidatà Pep Mòdol ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish sociologists Category:People from Lleida
title: Josep Ramon Mòdol i Pifarré
